info.name: Space Fanfiction
info.description: Fanfiction.net theme that looks like spacebattles, see https://forums.spacebattles.com/
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1

I wanted ffn to look more like sb, it's one of the main sites i read fics on. so i did?

Version 2: Release Date Mar 31 (ongoing)

Theme now affects the entire site. Added rainbow gradients for april fools. Fixed some icons. Fixed some buttons that were using different border colors than the others.

Apr 4 19: .timeline-Widget {background-color: #ffffff10}


Version 2.3: April fools Is over.

Version 2.4: Tweaked Button coloring a bit. Here are most of the changes
Removed April Fool's section
active buttons now use a gray background, white bottom border and black text
focused dropdown menu links when focused now have a dull color & background; hovered dropdown menu links no longer have a bottom white border
In the Forum, the "New" button (short for New Topic) no longer has a border bottom width on hover

Some parts of the code were moved around

added this line: *:focus{outline:none!important}
